title: Bard: The Troll Champion
body:
WIth the new champion Bard coming out soon, get ready to be trolled!

Enjoy Bard giving the enemy a free portal through a wall to get you, or even freeze your whole team while the enemies wreck you!

replies.body: They should just make it so every one is immune not frozen
Well it freezes everyone and makes everyone immune its like a giant zhonyas

You know that it empowers the community if the team is dependent of someone and bard is this one. Its like : Hey dont flame on me or you are dead! But is that bad ? At least i think that many players wont flame him in fear to get ulted to the wrong moment and also i like that they give trust in the community with this new concept

Hah. Its funny how I thought exactly the same thing. His ult can freeze your own team. If your ally flashed over a wall to escape u can just e for the enemy to go over too. Rito sure did a good job of increasing toxicity in the future
Roam the whole map, never go down bot and when your ADC asks why, you say you're looking for shrines. Then come back 15 minutes later and ask why she/he did so bad.
Bard is an interesting concept, but lol community is too toxic for it to not be misused
zhonyas your whole team whilst doing barron/dragon so the enemy can steal it ezpz.
im excited to see it happen in my games. I don't have the champ so I want to see him in action
also freeze your whole team when they are pushing turrets/inhibs, so that they can do it then back away
